verses.roman:
bahu-kṣaṇe kṛṣṇa-nāma hṛdaye paśilā
'hari-bola' bali' prabhu garjiyā uṭhilā

synonyms: bahu-kṣaṇe—after a long time; kṛṣṇa-nāma—the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; hṛdaye paśilā—entered the heart; hari-bola bali'-saying Hari bol; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; garjiyā—making a loud sound; uṭhilā—got up.
translation: After they chanted in this way for a long time, the holy name of Kṛṣṇa entered the heart of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, and He suddenly arose with a loud shout of "Hari bol."
